summary: In this sequel to "Knock On Any Door", the residents of a Chicago tenement building band together to insure that the son of Nick Romano does not follow in his father's footsteps...to the electric chair.
cast: Burl Ives|Shelley Winters|James Darren|Jean Seberg|Ricardo Montalban|Ella Fitzgerald|Rodolfo Acosta|Philip Ober|Jeanne Cooper|Bernie Hamilton|Walter Burke|Francis De Sales|Michael Davis|John Barton|Oscar Blank|Phil Bloom|Nesdon Booth|Peter Brocco|Jack Bryan|Malcolm Cassell|Carmen D'Antonio|Ted Fish|Jamie Forster|Joey Fricano|Joseph Gallison|Dick Gering|Percy Helton|Roy Jenson|Jack Kenney|Lenny Kent|Tom London|Dal McKennon|David McMahon|Mike Morelli|Danny Mummert|Sol Murgi|George Nardelli|Jack Semple|Al Silvani|Marjorie Stapp|Jack Stoney|Frank Sully|Theresa Testa|Tony Urchel|Dale Van Sickel|Guy Way
keywords: sequel|killing a judge|abused woman|see through bra|appellate judge
title: Que nadie escriba mi epitafio
